value.title: Nvidia’s AI recreates Pac-Man from scratch just by watching it being played
value.excerpt: For its latest project, Nvidia researchers taught an AI system to recreate the game of Pac-Man simply by watching it being played. There’s no coding involved, no pre-rendered images for the software to draw on.

images.title: Nvidia’s AI recreates Pac-Man from scratch just by watching it being played

value.title: Nvidia researchers use AI to recreate PAC-MAN, without a game engine
value.excerpt: Using generative adversarial networks, Nvidia opens up a line of research that could have implications not just for game creation but for real-world settings like factory floors.

images.title: Nvidia researchers use AI to recreate PAC-MAN, without a game engine

value.title: 'Pac-Man' once felt futuristic. Now there's a new one built entirely by AI.
